Packages 
Package Description
com.google.appinventor.buildserver
Classes to build APKs for App Inventor projects.
com.google.appinventor.client
Code running in the App Inventor programmer's browser.
com.google.appinventor.client.boxes
Box widgets for the portion of App Inventor that runs in the browser.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor
Editors for the in-browser portion of the App Inventor client.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple
Classes for maintaining (but not creating) the component palette and the graphical respresentation of components in the current project.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.components
Mock components (GWT widgets) used within the Designer to represent the real components that run on the mobile device.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.components.utils  
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.palette
Support for the palette within the Designer from which components can be selected.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.youngandroid
Additional Designer functionality beyond that provided in com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple, including communication with the Blocks Editor.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.youngandroid.palette
Implementation of com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.palette with additions enabling there to be different categories (such as "User Interface" or "Sensors") with separate panels.
com.google.appinventor.client.editor.youngandroid.properties
GUI support for modifying components' property values within the Designer.
com.google.appinventor.client.explorer
Provides the source structure explorer in the Designer showing component hierarchy and enabling components to be renamed or deleted.
com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.commands
Provides abstract and concrete classes for various commands that can be executed through button presses and context menus within the Designer.
com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.project
Functionality for creating, loading, and deleting projects.
com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.youngandroid
GUI support for displaying and manipulating assets and projects.
com.google.appinventor.client.jsonp  
com.google.appinventor.client.output  
com.google.appinventor.client.properties  
com.google.appinventor.client.properties.json  
com.google.appinventor.client.settings  
com.google.appinventor.client.settings.project  
com.google.appinventor.client.settings.user  
com.google.appinventor.client.tracking  
com.google.appinventor.client.utils  
com.google.appinventor.client.widgets  
com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes  
com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.dnd  
com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties  
com.google.appinventor.client.wizards  
com.google.appinventor.client.wizards.youngandroid  
com.google.appinventor.client.youngandroid  
com.google.appinventor.common
Classes shared by multiple App Inventor sub-projects.
com.google.appinventor.common.jsonp
Constants related to JSONP.
com.google.appinventor.common.testutils
Utility methods for testing.
com.google.appinventor.common.utils
Utility methods for working with filenames and strings.
com.google.appinventor.common.version
Methods for determining whether a new feature should be user-visible.
com.google.appinventor.common.youngandroid
Constants related to the local http server used for communications between the Designer and Blocks Editor.
com.google.appinventor.components.annotations
Defines annotations to specify component names, descriptions, properties, methods, events, permissions, categories, etc.
com.google.appinventor.components.common
Defines constants, helper methods, and an enumeration used throughout App Inventor.
com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Components for App Inventor runtime library.
com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.collect
Utilities providing static methods used by component code for working with collections.
com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.errors
Runtime errors that can occur in App Inventor apps.
com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util
Utilities supporting the component code.
com.google.appinventor.components.scripts
Provides classes for generating information about components from the annotations and comments in their source code.
com.google.appinventor.rebind  
com.google.appinventor.server  
com.google.appinventor.server.encryption  
com.google.appinventor.server.flags  
com.google.appinventor.server.project  
com.google.appinventor.server.project.utils  
com.google.appinventor.server.project.youngandroid  
com.google.appinventor.server.properties.json  
com.google.appinventor.server.storage  
com.google.appinventor.server.util  
com.google.appinventor.shared.jsonp  
com.google.appinventor.shared.properties.json  
com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc  
com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc.help  
com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc.launch  
com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc.project  
com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc.project.youngandroid  
com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc.user  
com.google.appinventor.shared.settings  
com.google.appinventor.shared.simple  
com.google.appinventor.shared.storage  
com.google.appinventor.shared.util  
com.google.appinventor.shared.youngandroid  
com.google.appinventor.yailgenerator
